long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boldify is a thoughtful Chrome extension designed to aid readability and enhance focus. By turning the first half of each word on any webpage into bold text with a simple right-click, it creates a unique visual cue that can significantly benefit individuals with dyslexia and neurodivergent readers. 

This subtle yet powerful transformation helps to anchor the gaze, making it easier to track and process text. Whether for casual browsing, intensive research, or everyday reading, Boldify offers an innovative way to reduce visual stress and elevate your online reading experience.
